articles.author: Niha Masih
articles.title: Oxford’s new malaria R21/Matrix-M vaccine approved by WHO - The Washington Post
articles.description: The World Health Organization reported an estimated 619,000 deaths in 2021 from malaria, which disproportionately affects children under 5 in Africa.
articles.content:

The World Health Organization has approved a new anti-malaria vaccine, which will offer countries a cheap and more accessible option to combat one of the leading cause… [+3308 chars]
